title: The Chosen of Shar
content: graveyard. We must be drawing close to the place Shadowheart wishes to find. We discovered that Shadowheart possesses a certain amount of resistance to the ill effects of the shadow curse. It seems that this must be due to Shar's patronage - but given the mercurial nature of the dark goddess, the extent of her protection remains to be seen.
